user_prompt: Refine the automation for creating a weekly project status dashboard.

chosen_task.name: Generate weekly status dashboard
chosen_task.description: Create a Notion page summarizing project KPIs (tasks completed, blockers, upcoming milestones) and a Google Sheet with a table for weekly metrics.

clarification_answers.kpi_definitions: Tasks completed = tasks marked done in last 7 days; blockers = tasks stuck >3 days; milestones = next 2 weeks.
